API docs by Redocly

OfficeX Filesharing API (Beta 1.0)

Download OpenAPI specification:

Copy Prompt via Download button ☝️

REST API for OfficeX filesharing app - https://officex.app

Also try it in iframe mode: https://fir-iframe-officex.web.app

All the code on Github:

  • NodeJS Server (Web2 Backend): https://github.com/OfficeXApp/typescript-server
  • Rust ICP Canister (Web3 Backend): https://github.com/OfficeXApp/canisters-official
  • Storage WebApp (Frontend UI): https://github.com/OfficeXApp/Storage
  • Typescript Types: https://github.com/OfficeXApp/types
  • Demo iFrame: https://github.com/OfficeXApp/iframe-demo

API Keys

Operations for managing API keys

Get API Key

Retrieve an API key by its ID

Authorizations:
BearerAuth
path Parameters
organization_id
required
string (DriveID)
Example: DriveID_abc123

Unique identifier for a drive

api_key_id
required
string (ApiKeyID)
Example: ApiKeyID_abc123

ID of the API key to retrieve

header Parameters
Authorization
required
stringBearer TOKEN
Example: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUz...

Bearer token for authentication

Responses

/v1/drive/{organization_id}/api_keys/get/{api_key_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • default
Content type
application/json
{
  • "ok": {
    • "data": {
      • "id": "ApiKeyID_abc123",
      • "value": "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY_VALUE",
      • "user_id": "UserID_abcdef123456",
      • "name": "string",
      • "created_at": 0,
      • "expires_at": 0,
      • "is_revoked": true,
      • "tags": [
        • "string"
        ],
      • "external_id": "string",
      • "external_payload": "string"
      }
    }
}

List API Keys

List all API keys for a specific user

Authorizations:
BearerAuth
path Parameters
organization_id
required
string (DriveID)
Example: DriveID_abc123

Unique identifier for a drive

user_id
required
string (UserID)
Example: UserID_abcdef123456

ID of the user whose API keys to list

header Parameters
Authorization
required
stringBearer TOKEN
Example: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUz...

Bearer token for authentication

Responses

/v1/drive/{organization_id}/api_keys/list/{user_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • default
Content type
application/json
{
  • "ok": {
    • "data": [
      • {
        • "id": "ApiKeyID_abc123",
        • "value": "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY_VALUE",
        • "user_id": "UserID_abcdef123456",
        • "name": "string",
        • "created_at": 0,
        • "expires_at": 0,
        • "is_revoked": true,
        • "tags": [
          • "string"
          ],
        • "external_id": "string",
        • "external_payload": "string"
        }
      ]
    }
}

Create API Key

Create a new API key

Authorizations:
BearerAuth
path Parameters
organization_id
required
string (DriveID)
Example: DriveID_abc123

Unique identifier for a drive

header Parameters
Authorization
required
stringBearer TOKEN
Example: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUz...

Bearer token for authentication

Request Body schema: application/json
required

API key data to create or update

name
required
string <= 256 characters

Name for the API key

user_id
string (UserID)

Unique identifier for a user

expires_at
integer or null <int64>

Timestamp when the key expires, -1 for never expires

external_id
string or null <= 256 characters

External identifier

external_payload
string or null <= 8192 characters

Additional data for external systems

Responses

/v1/drive/{organization_id}/api_keys/create

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/json
{
  • "name": "Development API Key",
  • "user_id": "UserID_abc123",
  • "expires_at": 1703980800000,
  • "external_id": "ext-key-001",
  • "external_payload": "{\"department\": \"engineering\", \"purpose\": \"backend-integration\"}"
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • default
Content type
application/json
{
  • "ok": {
    • "data": {
      • "id": "ApiKeyID_abc123",
      • "value": "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY_VALUE",
      • "user_id": "UserID_abcdef123456",
      • "name": "string",
      • "created_at": 0,
      • "expires_at": 0,
      • "is_revoked": true,
      • "tags": [
        • "string"
        ],
      • "external_id": "string",
      • "external_payload": "string"
      }
    }
}

Update API Key

Update API key

Authorizations:
BearerAuth
path Parameters
organization_id
required
string (DriveID)
Example: DriveID_abc123

Unique identifier for a drive

header Parameters
Authorization
required
stringBearer TOKEN
Example: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUz...

Bearer token for authentication

Request Body schema: application/json
required

API key data to create or update

id
required
string (ApiKeyID)

Unique identifier for an API key

name
string or null <= 256 characters

New name for the API key

expires_at
integer or null <int64>

New expiration timestamp, -1 for never expires

is_revoked
boolean or null

Whether to revoke the API key

external_id
string (ExternalID) <= 256 characters

External identifier for integration purposes

external_payload
string (ExternalPayload) <= 8192 characters

Additional data for external integrations. Eg Stringified JSON

Responses

/v1/drive/{organization_id}/api_keys/update

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/json
{
  • "id": "ApiKeyID_abc123",
  • "name": "Production API Key",
  • "is_revoked": false,
  • "expires_at": -1,
  • "external_id": "ext-key-001-prod",
  • "external_payload": "{\"department\": \"engineering\", \"purpose\": \"production-access\", \"approved_by\": \"manager-id-123\"}"
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • default
Content type
application/json
{
  • "ok": {
    • "data": {
      • "id": "ApiKeyID_abc123",
      • "value": "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY_VALUE",
      • "user_id": "UserID_abcdef123456",
      • "name": "string",
      • "created_at": 0,
      • "expires_at": 0,
      • "is_revoked": true,
      • "tags": [
        • "string"
        ],
      • "external_id": "string",
      • "external_payload": "string"
      }
    }
}

Authorizations:
BearerAuth
path Parameters
organization_id
required
string (DriveID)
Example: DriveID_abc123

Unique identifier for a drive

header Parameters
Authorization
required
stringBearer TOKEN
Example: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUz...

Bearer token for authentication

Request Body schema: application/json
required

ID of the API key to delete

id
required
string (ApiKeyID)

Unique identifier for an API key

Responses

/v1/drive/{organization_id}/api_keys/delete

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/json
{
  • "id": "ApiKeyID_abc123"
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • default
Content type
application/json
{
  • "ok": {
    • "data": {
      • "id": "ApiKeyID_abc123",
      • "deleted": true
      }
    }
}

Directory

Operations for managing files and folders

List Directory

List files and folders within a specified directory

Authorizations:
BearerAuth
path Parameters
organization_id
required
string (DriveID)
Example: DriveID_abc123

Unique identifier for a drive

header Parameters
Authorization
required
stringBearer TOKEN
Example: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUz...

Bearer token for authentication

Request Body schema: application/json
required

Directory listing parameters

folder_id
string or null

ID of the folder to list contents from

path
string or null

Path to the folder to list contents from

filters
string <= 256 characters
Default: ""

Filter string for directory contents

page_size
integer [ 1 .. 1000 ]
Default: 50

Number of items per page

direction
string
Default: "ASC"
Enum: "ASC" "DESC"

Sort direction

cursor
string or null <= 256 characters

Cursor for pagination

Responses

/v1/drive/{organization_id}/directory/list

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/json
{
  • "folder_id": "FolderID_abc123",
  • "path": "/documents/project/",
  • "filters": "",
  • "page_size": 50,
  • "direction": "ASC",
  • "cursor": "string"
}

  • default

Directory Actions

Perform actions on files and folders such as get, create, update, delete, copy, move, and restore

Authorizations:
BearerAuth
path Parameters
organization_id
required
string (DriveID)
Example: DriveID_abc123

Unique identifier for a drive

header Parameters
Authorization
required
stringBearer TOKEN
Example: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUz...

Bearer token for authentication

Request Body schema: application/json
required

Directory actions to perform

required
Array of objects (DirectoryAction)

List of directory actions to execute

Responses

/v1/drive/{organization_id}/directory/action

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/json
Example
{
  • "actions": [
    • {
      • "action": "GET_FILE",
      • "target": {
        • "resource_id": "FileID_abc123",
        • "resource_path": "DiskID::/documents/project/file.txt"
        },
      • "payload": {
        • "share_track_hash": "track123"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • default
Content type
application/json
Example
{
  • "ok": {
    • "data": [
      • {
        • "id": "response-id-123",
        • "success": true,
        • "request": {
          • "action": "GET_FILE",
          • "target": {
            • "resource_id": "FileID_abc123",
            • "resource_path": "DiskID::/documents/project/file.txt"
            },
          • "payload": {
            • "share_track_hash": "track123"
            }
          },
        • "response": {
          • "result": {
            • "file": {
              • "id": "FileID_abc123",
              • "name": "file.txt",
              • "folder_uuid": "FolderID_xyz789",
              • "file_version": 1,
              • "extension": "txt",
              • "clipped_directory_path": "/documents/project/file.txt",
              • "tags": [
                • "project",
                • "documentation"
                ],
              • "created_by": "UserID_123",
              • "created_at": 1672531200000,
              • "disk_id": "DiskID_abc123",
              • "disk_type": "AwsBucket",
              • "file_size": 1024,
              • "raw_url": "https://example.com/file.txt",
              • "last_updated_date_ms": 1672531200000,
              • "last_updated_by": "UserID_123",
              • "deleted": false,
              • "canister_id": "abc123xyz456",
              • "expires_at": 1704067200000,
              • "has_sovereign_permissions": true
              },
            • "permissions": [
              • {
                • "permission_id": "DirectoryPermissionID_123",
                • "grant_type": "VIEW"
                },
              • {
                • "permission_id": "DirectoryPermissionID_456",
                • "grant_type": "EDIT"
                }
              ],
            • "requester_id": "UserID_123"
            },
          • "error": null
          }
        }
      ]
    }
}

Get File Asset

Proxy access to file assets with temporary presigned URLs

Authorizations:
BearerAuth
path Parameters
organization_id
required
string (DriveID)
Example: DriveID_abc123

Unique identifier for a drive

file_id_with_extension
required
string
Example: FileID_abc123.pdf

File ID with file extension

header Parameters
Authorization
required
stringBearer TOKEN
Example: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUz...

Bearer token for authentication

Responses

/v1/drive/{organization_id}/directory/asset/{file_id_with_extension}

Response samples

  • default
Content type
application/json
{
  • "err": {
    • "code": 0,
    • "message": "string"
    }
}

Directory Actions

Data types and models used throughout the API. See POST /directory/actions

GetFolderAction

action
required
string
Value: "GET_FOLDER"
required
object (ResourceIdentifier)

Identifies a resource by either path or ID

required
object (GetFolderPayload)
{
  • "action": "GET_FOLDER",
  • "target": {
    • "resource_id": "FolderID_xyz789",
    • "resource_path": "DiskID::/documents/project/"
    },
  • "payload": {
    • "share_track_hash": "track456"
    }
}

CreateFileAction

action
required
string
Value: "CREATE_FILE"
required
object (ResourceIdentifier)

Identifies a resource by either path or ID

required
object (CreateFilePayload)

Payload for creating a file. Clients can specify body.id = uuidv4 if they want.

{
  • "action": "CREATE_FILE",
  • "target": {
    • "resource_id": "FolderID_xyz789",
    • "resource_path": "DiskID::/documents/project/"
    },
  • "payload": {
    • "name": "example.txt",
    • "extension": "txt",
    • "tags": [
      • "project",
      • "documentation"
      ],
    • "file_size": 1024,
    • "raw_url": "https://example.com/file.txt",
    • "disk_id": "DiskID_abc123",
    • "expires_at": 1704067200000,
    • "file_conflict_resolution": "KEEP_BOTH",
    • "has_sovereign_permissions": true,
    • "external_id": "external-file-001",
    • "external_payload": "{\"department\": \"engineering\", \"project\": \"alpha\"}"
    }
}

  • "target": {
    • "resource_id": "FolderID_xyz789",

    • "external_id": "external-folder-001",

action
required
string
Value: "COPY_FILE"

    • "destination_folder_id": "FolderID_new123",

    }
}

Contacts

Operations for managing contacts

Get Contact

Retrieve a contact by its ID

Authorizations:
BearerAuth
path Parameters
organization_id
required
string (DriveID)
Example: DriveID_abc123

Unique identifier for a drive

contact_id
required
string (UserID)
Example: UserID_abcdef123456

ID of the contact to retrieve

header Parameters
Authorization
required
stringBearer TOKEN
Example: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUz...

Bearer token for authentication

Responses

/v1/drive/{organization_id}/contacts/get/{contact_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • default
Content type
application/json
{
  • "ok": {
    • "data": {
      • "id": "UserID_abcdef123456",
      • "name": "string",
      • "avatar": "string",
      • "notifications_url": "string",
      • "email": "string",
      • "public_note": "string",
      • "private_note": "string",
      • "evm_public_address": "string",
      • "icp_principal": "string",
      • "groups": [
        • "GroupID_123456"
        ],
      • "tags": [
        • "string"
        ],
      • "created_at": 0,
      • "last_online_at": 0,
      • "group_previews": [
        • {
          • "group_id": "GroupID_123456",
          • "invite_id": "string",
          • "is_admin": null,
          • "group_name": "string",
          • "group_avatar": "string"
          }
        ],
      • "permission_previews": [
        • "CREATE"
        ],
      • "external_id": "string",
      • "external_payload": "string"
      }
    }
}

List Contacts

List contacts with optional filtering and pagination

Authorizations:
BearerAuth
path Parameters
organization_id
required
string (DriveID)
Example: DriveID_abc123

Unique identifier for a drive

header Parameters
Authorization
required
stringBearer TOKEN
Example: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUz...

Bearer token for authentication

Request Body schema: application/json
required

Filtering and pagination parameters

filters
string <= 256 characters
Default: ""

object or null
